name: SID 0x3E Tester Present Test Suite
description: Comprehensive test suite for UDS Service ID 0x3E (TesterPresent) based on ISO 14229-1:2020 Section 9.3. Covers positive response, suppressed response, sub-function validation, message length validation, and session maintenance scenarios.

requests.description: TC-01: Tester Present with Zero Sub-function (0x00) - Expect Positive Response (0x7E 00)
TC-02: Tester Present with Suppress Response (0x80) - Expect No Response
TC-03: Invalid Sub-function (0x01) - Expect NRC 0x12 (Sub-function Not Supported)
TC-04: Invalid Sub-function (0x02) - Expect NRC 0x12 (Sub-function Not Supported)
TC-05: Incorrect Message Length (Extra Byte: 3E 00 FF) - Expect NRC 0x13
TC-06: Incorrect Message Length (Missing Sub-function: 3E) - Expect NRC 0x13
TC-07.1: Switch to EXTENDED session (Session Maintenance Test)
TC-07.2: Tester Present (0x80) to maintain session (T+2s)
TC-07.3: Tester Present (0x80) to maintain session (T+4s)
TC-07.4: Tester Present (0x80) to maintain session (T+6s)
TC-07.5: Read Data (SID 22) F1 90 - Expect Success (Session should still be valid after >5s total time)

metadata.author: UDS Simulator
metadata.description: ISO 14229-1:2020 Section 9.3 compliant test suite for SID 0x3E (TesterPresent). Validates response behavior (suppressed/normal), negative response codes (0x12, 0x13), and session maintenance capability.

notes: Test Suite v1.0.0: Comprehensive coverage for SID 0x3E. Verification includes: (TC-01) Normal response 0x3E 00 -> 0x7E 00. (TC-02) Suppressed response 0x3E 80 -> No response. (TC-03/04) Invalid sub-functions return NRC 0x12. (TC-05/06) Invalid message lengths (too short/long) return NRC 0x13. (TC-07) Session maintenance verification in Extended session.
